CaretBlock.Try: By default, IntelliJ IDEA completes your code instantly. Start typing Ran right where the caret is, and you will see the Lookup Menu with matching suggestions. You can choose the first item from the Lookup menu by pressing EditorEnter.
To activate Basic Completion, press CodeCompletion and you will see lookup menu again.
Press EditorEnter to choose the top item in the lookup menu.
Press EditorCompleteStatement to complete this statement.
Sometimes you need to see suggestions for static constants or methods. Press CodeCompletion twice to access a deeper level of Code Completion.
